caption.title: Demography of the vaccine recipients in the study area, 1978–2014.
caption.p: (A) The monthly number of births in Hu County. The numbers are averaged for each year. (B) The monthly number of deaths. (C) The age distribution of HFRS cases and the population demography in Hu County. The vaccine was provided to people aged 16–60 yrs. as people in this age group accounted for more than 90% of the total cases in the study area, and the Pharmacopeia of the People’s Republic of China (2005) specified that vaccines could only be administered to people between 16 and 60 years of age.
Click here for additional data file.
